_items.name: MARS ROVER
_responsibilities: - knows its orientation w.r.t. a North.

_items.name: COORDINATES
_responsibilities: - knows whether it is equal to another coordinate

_items.name: DIRECTION
_responsibilities: - knows the direction when turning left
- knows the direction when turning right

_items.name: VEHICLE CONTROLLER
_responsibilities: knows how to take a command and move the vehicle

_items.name: PLANET
_responsibilities: knows whether a location is at the northern edge
knows the coordinates that succeed the current one
knows the coordinates that precede the current one
